job.name: &MY_FILELIST;
job.command:
starver &STAR_VER;
cp &CODE_DIR;/runlists/&MY_FILELIST; &OUT_DIR;/lists/&MY_FILELIST;.lis
setenv RUNLIST &OUT_DIR;/lists/&MY_FILELIST;.lis setenv OPTIONS `echo &STANA_OPTIONS; | sed 's/_/ /g'` setenv OPT_JETS `echo $OPTIONS | awk '{print index($0,"--jets")}'` setenv COMMAND "./stana -f $RUNLIST $OPTIONS"
if ($OPT_JETS == 0) ln -s &OUT_DIR;_--jets/jets/&MY_FILELIST;_jets.root cp -r &CODE_DIR;/.sl53_gcc432 . cp -r &CODE_DIR;/stana . ls -al
echo echo "OUT_DIR: " &OUT_DIR; echo "CODE_DIR: " &CODE_DIR; echo "MY_FILELIST: " &MY_FILELIST; echo "STAR_VER: " &STAR_VER; echo "STANA_OPTIONS: " &STANA_OPTIONS; echo echo "STAR: " $STAR echo "FILELIST: " $FILELIST echo "RUNLIST: " $RUNLIST echo "OPTIONS: " $OPTIONS echo "OPT_JETS: " $OPT_JETS echo "SCRATCH: " $SCRATCH echo "pwd: " `pwd` echo "COMMAND: " $COMMAND echo
`$COMMAND`
# Remove files and links if ($OPT_JETS == 0) rm &MY_FILELIST;_jets.root chmod 664 *_hist.root *_jets.root *_tree.root *.ps chmod 664 &OUT_DIR;/log/&MY_FILELIST;.log touch &OUT_DIR;/log/&MY_FILELIST;.log rm -fr ./.sl53_gcc432 rm -fr ./stana
echo "End of stana: tralala"
